sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import {Container, Row, Col} from 'reactstrap' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import '../styles/tourdetails.css' const TourDetails = () => { const {id}=useParams(); //this is currently static data //later we will call API from here, and load data from db const tour = tourData.find(tour=>tour.id===id) //destructuring properties from tour object const {photo,title,desc,price,review, city, distance, maxGroupSize}=tour; return <>

{title}

 } export default TourDetails
